snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 173: Sonic MAdventure 2: The Sequal! (SAGE2002)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic MAdventure 2: The Sequal!  - Demo
Credit: Red XVI (Dragon XVI) - Elysium Games
Release Date: Undefined (Possibly 2011)

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00 - Logo
00:32 - Previously...
00:50 - Title&Story
01:53 - Cutscene 1
03:22 - Prologue Boss
04:15 - Cutscene 2
05:51 - City - SFGHQ
07:34 - Inn (City - SFGHQ)
09:53 - Empty Building (City - SFGHQ)
10:41 - Arcade (City - SFGHQ)
11:42 - Cutscene 3
13:22 - Security (City - SFGHQ
14:07 - Sky Lift Building
16:00 - Game Over Screen
16:09 - Sky Lift Boss
20:09 - Sky Lift Airport
24:39 - Sky Stadium Boss
26:46 - Cutscene 4
29:03 - Final Boss
31:35 - Ending
32:15 - Credits

(EXTRA)
33:15 - Just some Scenery.
33:45 - A Blast from the Past...
40:10 - Secret of the Funkmuffin

NOTES: Madventure... MADventure... MAdventure... Star Madventure Wars... It's all the same...
WHEN we are dealing with the WILD WILD world of Elysium Games!
For reasons unknown, i always feel happy about playing Red/Dragon's games... I want more of this type of randomness.
Truly an RPG with plot thrown out the "Plothole" Does that make sense? No? That's good then!
Lesson learned today... Elysium brakes for Kitsunes.
